entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
